amendment.description: To provide an effective date for the modification of revenue requirements for proprietary institutions of higher education.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1342 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1342 proposed by Senator Moran to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1245-1246; text: CR S1245) To provide an effective date for the modification of revenue requirements for proprietary institutions of higher education.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1342 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1342 proposed by Senator Moran to Amendment SA 891.
